channel.title: HUD damage thingy
channel.description:
So after the houndeye blows up the bridge, there's a map transition. A headcrab jumped just before the transition and after the map loaded, I got bitten by it. After that I had a permanent red damage-showing thing, just stuck there on the screen, even though I didn't take any damage after that.
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=440010267[/url]
